to all those that are getting TRIAL PERIOD EXPIRED when running the installer now that .315 has been released.. this little trick will allow you to bypass the version check in the DT installer..

1. google 7-ZIP, Download & install

2. right click on the daemon tools installer and use the 7-zip option extract to (folder name, should be DAEMON Tools Pro Advanced 4.41.0314.0232). This will extract all the files in the installer to a directory.

3. copy SND's cracked .dll's into the folder you just created..

4. click DTPRO & Install Gadget & windows will take care of the rest..

5. ENJOY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
